title: Stuck on authenticating following the new patch. Big shocker.
body:
Every time I try to log in the client gets stuck at "Authenticating" and sometimes I'll get a message that says an unexpected error has occurred but usually it is just an endless "Authenticating" message. I've runWinMTR and have not been getting any packet loss and my internet has been working fine. I have reinstalled the client 3 times now to no avail. I haven't had this error until the new patch. My log ins are nearly always crisp and instant. And I have disabled my Firewall completely trying to get it to connect. Any actual solution other than pointing me to the connection issues guide that I already know exists would be much appreciated.

replies.body: tell me if you find a solution to this i am still unable to play

> [{quoted}](name=big floppy clit,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XyqBubzc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-30T15:53:05.349+0000)
>
> tell me if you find a solution to this i am still unable to play

I was able to fix this by using a VPN. I recommend Windscribe. They give you 10GB a month for free. TunnelBear is also good. They will give only 500MB a month free though. Good luck.

I still haven't found a solution. Nobody can find anything wrong that could be causing this except the packet loss. I even turned off all of my firewalls to try playing the game but nothing has worked yet.

You're on the right track with your troubleshooting by running that traceroute, but this may not have anything to do with your ISP overall if you're stuck on the authentication step. Sometimes your firewall/antivirus/etc can block your signal from leaving your network which would keep you in the authenticating loop indefinitely, so let's start by making sure there isn't anything slightly off in your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). I know you mentioned going through that guide once already, but let's double check the firewall/DNS specifically this time.

If that doesn't help, let's go back to that traceroute and let it run for an adequate amount of time. Let it run for about 5 min (around 300 packets should be enough) and shoot it back my way!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XyqBubzc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-30T00:24:00.024+0000)
>
> You're on the right track with your troubleshooting by running that traceroute, but this may not have anything to do with your ISP overall if you're stuck on the authentication step. Sometimes your firewall/antivirus/etc can block your signal from leaving your network which would keep you in the authenticating loop indefinitely, so let's start by making sure there isn't anything slightly off in your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). I know you mentioned going through that guide once already, but let's double check the firewall/DNS specifically this time.
> 
> If that doesn't help, let's go back to that traceroute and let it run for an adequate amount of time. Let it run for about 5 min (around 300 packets should be enough) and shoot it back my way!

That's from the past several hours i was away and had it running. Experiencing 1% packet loss it seems overall. As for the firewall/DNS I have checked them carefully and there should be nothing stopping the client from running as it should.

Thanks! That 1% packet loss could possibly be what's preventing you from logging in, but honestly, I think there's gotta be something else that's blocking your connection. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to take a look at your game logs to see what might be happening.
fix this please i just bought new skins!!
